Unit 1 Lesson 3: MÄtauranga MÄori Inquiry Cards

ğŸŒ¿ Instructions

Cut out these cards and use them for group inquiry activities. Each card represents a different area of MÄori knowledge systems. Students can research, discuss, and present their findings.

How do genealogical connections shape MÄori identity and relationships?

ğŸ” Inquiry Process Suggestions

Research Questions

  • What is the traditional knowledge?
  • How is it practiced today?
  • Why is it important?
  • How can we respect and learn from it?

Presentation Ideas

  • Create a visual poster
  • Prepare a short presentation
  • Write a reflection piece
  • Design an infographic
